annotations.description: There was no time for the supporters to get bored during the game as it was full of action and thrilling moments. The home side were superior in this game. Both teams attempted to play possession football.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That's all for today as the game is over.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: A horde of players are waiting inside the penalty area for a cross from the corner, but Jesse Lingard (Manchester United) takes it short.
Marcus Rashford (Manchester United) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge. The ball goes out of play. Manchester United are awarded a corner kick.
Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away.
Michael Oliver blows his whistle as Wilfried Bony (Manchester City) used excessive force in the tackle during an attack.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: David Silva (Manchester City) takes the corner, but one of the defenders reacts well and rises highest to head the ball away.

A lofted cross from Gael Clichy (Manchester City) is unsuccessful as the opponent's defence quickly clears the ball out of the penalty area. The ball goes out of play and Manchester City have been awarded a corner kick.
Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) misses a great chance after he found some space in the box! His effort goes inches wide of the left post.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: Fourth official shows 6 min. of added time.
Yaya Toure (Manchester City) gets on the ball and beats an opponent, but his run is stopped by the referee Michael Oliver who sees an offensive foul.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Jesus Navas (Manchester City) takes the corner kick and sends a lovely ball into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence is ready and knocks the ball to safety.
Bacary Sagna (Manchester City) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him. The referee signals a corner kick to Manchester City.
Morgan Schneiderlin (Manchester United) takes the free kick and immediately restarts play with a short pass.
Fernandinho (Manchester City) brings his opponent down. Michael Oliver has a clear sight of it and blows his whistle for a foul. Manchester United are awarded a free kick.
Morgan Schneiderlin (Manchester United) makes a driving run into the box but he cannot work any space for a shot.
Anthony Martial (Manchester United) looks to break free, but his touch lets him down and he loses the ball.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Matteo Darmian is replaced by Timothy Fosu Mensah (Manchester United).
Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) found some space to dink a cross from the side into the box, but it needed to be more precise to threaten the opposition.

Fernando (Manchester City) wastes a great chance as he climbs high around the penalty spot to connect with a cross from the resulting free kick. He produces a header, but it goes well wide of the left post.
Chris Smalling (Manchester United) commits an ugly tackle on his opponent, but there is no caution from the referee. David Silva (Manchester City) takes the ball and sets it for the free kick.
Michael Carrick (Manchester United) delivers a poor cross from a free kick as one of the defenders comfortably clears it away.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Eliaquim Mangala (Manchester City) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Michael Oliver had an easy decision to make. There is a free kick near the sideline to Manchester United.
Jesus Navas (Manchester City) strikes from the edge of the box, but hits it really poorly and sends the ball way over the bar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner from David Silva (Manchester City) is hurriedly cleared.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Jesus Navas (Manchester City) takes the resulting corner which is well defended. Manchester City will take a corner kick.

Wow, what an escape. Wilfried Bony (Manchester City) has an effort from inside the box but it's brilliantly blocked. The ball is out of play. Manchester City will have a chance to score from a corner.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Jesus Navas (Manchester City) quickly takes the corner kick with a short pass.
Yaya Toure (Manchester City) tries to pass the ball into the penalty area but it's blocked. The linesman makes the right call and Manchester City will have a corner.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Today's match ends for Juan Manuel Mata who will be replaced by Bastian Schweinsteiger (Manchester United).
Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) produces an effort from the edge of the box, but doesn't hit the ball properly and sends it yards wide of the right post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The ball is whipped in from the corner by Daley Blind (Manchester United), but one of the defenders gets it clear.
Antonio Valencia (Manchester United) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away. Manchester United earn a corner.
Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) connects with a cross from out wide in the six yard box, but only plants his header onto the right post.
Wilfried Bony (Manchester City) collects a pass inside the box and unleashes a shot which is brilliantly blocked by a defender.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee stops play so that a substitution can be made and Marcos Rojo leaves the pitch and Antonio Valencia (Manchester United) comes on.
Wilfried Bony (Manchester City) fires the ball towards goal from outside the penalty area, but it is blocked by one of his teammates.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: David Silva (Manchester City) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates.
Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) tries to send a pass but it's blocked. The ball goes behind for a corner. Manchester City will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

annotations.label: funfact
annotations.description: 26:5 – the total goal attempt statistics.
Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) takes a mid range shot, but the ball sails high over the bar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Daley Blind (Manchester United) takes the corner but only sends it into a huddle of the defenders and one of them makes a good clearance.

Marcus Rashford (Manchester United) collects a brilliant pass inside the box and finds himself in a goal scoring opportunity. He takes a shot, but the effort is well blocked by one of the defending players. Manchester United have been awarded a corner kick.
Wilfried Bony (Manchester City) latched on to a cross into the box and headed the ball under the crossbar. A decent header but it lacked power, allowing the goalkeeper to make a comfortable save.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Wilfried Bony (Manchester City) in, Martin Demichelis out.
Anthony Martial (Manchester United) slides a pass forward, but one of the defenders cuts it out.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Joe Hart is substituted due to injury. Manuel Pellegrini gives a chance to Wilfredo Caballero (Manchester City).

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Joe Hart (Manchester City) requires medical treatment, so the referee stops play and signals for the physio to come onto the pitch.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Referee Michael Oliver blows his whistle to start the second half.

We are seeing a great game so far, let's hope the players will be able to sustain their level of performance and keep entertaining the fans in such a fabulous way. We are witnessing quite a balanced game with both teams struggling to prevail. Both sides are using the same slow build up play tactic.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The end of the first half.
Yaya Toure (Manchester City) wins the ball from the resulting free kick but scuffs his shot well wide of the left post!

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: There will be a minimum of 2 min. of added time.
Jesus Navas (Manchester City) takes a direct free kick.

Daley Blind (Manchester United) should know this behaviour is beyond the rules. He was too careless with his challenge and left Michael Oliver no option but to blow his whistle. Manchester City win a free kick and will be able to apply some pressure on the opposition goal.
Michael Carrick (Manchester United) takes a short free kick.
The ball spins up and hits the hand of Martin Demichelis (Manchester City) after he fails to control it and the referee blows his whistle for a foul. Manchester United have been awarded a free kick.
Marcus Rashford (Manchester United) slips past one challenge, but is unable to feed a low pass into the path of one of his teammates.
Marcos Rojo (Manchester United) flights in the cross, but the defender is alert and clears to safety. The referee and the linesman both signal a throw in for Manchester United.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: David Silva (Manchester City) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates. The ball is easily cleared out of danger.

Jesus Navas (Manchester City) finds himself in a promising position after receiving a precise pass. He pulls the trigger but only hits one of the opposition, who gets in the way of his effort. Manchester City force their opponents to concede a corner.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Jesus Navas (Manchester City) attempts to find a teammate with the corner, but the effort is snuffed out by the goalkeeper.
A cross from Jesus Navas (Manchester City) fails to reach the box as the defence clears the ball away to safety. The ball is out of play. Manchester City win a corner kick.
Morgan Schneiderlin (Manchester United) plays a through ball inside the box, but it's too strong and Joe Hart comes off his line to intercept.
An accurate pass to the edge of the box is well taken by Yaya Toure (Manchester City), whose instinctive shot towards goal flashes inches wide of the left post.
Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) is flagged for offside.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner comes to nothing as Daley Blind (Manchester United) sends it out of play.

Marcos Rojo (Manchester United) sends a pass into the penalty area, but the opponent manages to cut it out. The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to Manchester United.
Jesus Navas (Manchester City) produces a dangerous low pass into the penalty area, but the defence manage to cut it out.
Yaya Toure (Manchester City) is caught offside!

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Manuel Pellegrini is forced to make a change. Raheem Sterling is unable to continue due to injury, Fernando (Manchester City) comes on.
The linesman raises his flag. Matteo Darmian (Manchester United) is adjudged offside.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner from Jesus Navas (Manchester City) is intercepted by the defence.

The ball is cleared after Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) attempted to dribble past an opposing player. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Manchester City will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.
Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) is moving okay again after that injury scare.

Martin Demichelis (Manchester City) creates himself some space around the penalty spot and connects with the free kick. His header is so wild it sails way past the right post and behind for a goal kick.
David Silva (Manchester City) is going to send the ball in from the free kick.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) is asking for medical treatment, but he will have to leave the pitch in order to receive help from the physio.

Juan Manuel Mata (Manchester United) trips an opponent with a slide tackle. Michael Oliver stops the game and he could give him a card, but eventually decides on just a warning. Manchester City are awarded the free kick.
Anthony Martial (Manchester United) tries to create a chance, but puts too much weight on his pass.
Anthony Martial (Manchester United) shoots from the edge of the penalty area. The ball travels towards the target, but Joe Hart easily deals with the threat.
Sergio Aguero (Manchester City) commits a foul after unfairly battling his opponent for the ball.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: An amazing individual effort from Marcus Rashford (Manchester United) ends with a strike from inside the penalty area. He sends the ball precisely into the bottom right corner and makes it 0:1. Joe Hart was helpless.
Fernandinho (Manchester City) didn't manage to convert the resulting corner kick into a goal. He produced a header from a dangerous position inside the box, but he sent it well over the bar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Jesus Navas (Manchester City) goes over to take the corner kick and it looks like he will swing the ball into the penalty box.

Jesus Navas (Manchester City) wastes a great scoring opportunity! He receives a precise lofted cross inside the box and sends a quick low shot towards the middle of the goal. His effort lacks pace and that allows David de Gea to make a comfortable save. Manchester City will have a chance to score from a corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Daley Blind (Manchester United) steps up to take the corner. He launches the ball into the penalty area, but it only finds the head of an opposing player who clears the danger.
Marcus Rashford (Manchester United) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge. The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to Manchester United.
Another attempt to send the ball beyond the defence by Anthony Martial (Manchester United) is thwarted and cleared to safety.
The free kick from Yaya Toure (Manchester City) failed to provide any scoring opportunity, as one of the defenders did a good job and knocked it out.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Chris Smalling (Manchester United) shouldn't be surprised it's a yellow from the ref, who cooled the situation down well. A free kick is awarded to Manchester City.

Jesus Navas (Manchester City) holds his head in his hands after wasting a promising chance. He latches onto a rebound, creates some space for himself and fires the ball from the edge of the box well wide of the left post.
Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) serves up a nice cross, but the defence clears the danger.
Marcus Rashford (Manchester United) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away.
Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) nearly creates a chance, but his attempt to pick out a teammate with a through ball does not come off.
Bacary Sagna (Manchester City) sends a long ball across the pitch, but it misses its target.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: David Silva (Manchester City) sends a wonderful cross from the corner kick. However, the defence works perfectly to clear the ball and avert the threat.
Jesus Navas (Manchester City) sends the ball into the box from the side of the pitch, but his cross is blocked. The linesman points to the corner flag, Manchester City are going to take it.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The first half has started.
Manchester City will kick the game off.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: Both teams starting lineups are available now, so you can have a look at them.
Michael Oliver is introduced as the referee for today's match.
Hello and welcome to our minute by minute commentary of the upcoming clash. We will try to provide you with as accurate as possible picture of the happenings on the pitch. Have fun.

There was no time for the supporters to get bored during the game as it was full of action and thrilling moments. The home side were superior in this game. Both teams attempted to play possession football.
